tips: Talk to someone. Reconnect with friends and family!
Don't be afraid to seek help!
Unplug. Step away from social media and technology.
Try relaxation exercises, such as meditation, yoga, or prayer.
Journaling has been shown to help improve mental health, allowing you to put all your feelings into perspective and reflect.
Treat yourself. A nice hot bath, sweets, face masks... It doesn't hurt to put yourself first every once in a while.
Albert Einstein once said, "Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new." Go experiment!
